DynamoDBModelTableReadIOPS.Description: The number of read IOPS the table should support.

DynamoDBModelTableWriteIOPS.Description: The number of write IOPS the table should support.

DynamoDBBillingMode.Description: Configure @model types to create DynamoDB tables with PAY_PER_REQUEST or PROVISIONED billing modes.

DynamoDBEnablePointInTimeRecovery.Description: Whether to enable Point in Time Recovery on the table.

DynamoDBEnableServerSideEncryption.Description: Enable server side encryption powered by KMS.

OpenSearchAccessIAMRoleName.Description: The name of the IAM role assumed by AppSync for OpenSearch.

OpenSearchStreamingLambdaHandlerName.Description: The name of the lambda handler.

OpenSearchStreamingFunctionName.Description: The name of the streaming lambda function.

OpenSearchStreamBatchSize.Description: The maximum number of records to stream to OpenSearch per batch.

OpenSearchStreamMaximumBatchingWindowInS.Description: The maximum amount of time in seconds to wait for DynamoDB stream records before sending to streaming lambda.

OpenSearchStreamingIAMRoleName.Description: The name of the streaming lambda function IAM role.

OpenSearchDebugStreamingLambda.Description: Enable debug logs for the Dynamo -> OpenSearch streaming lambda.

OpenSearchInstanceCount.Description: The number of instances to launch into the OpenSearch domain.

OpenSearchInstanceType.Description: The type of instance to launch into the OpenSearch domain.

OpenSearchEBSVolumeGB.Description: The size in GB of the EBS volumes that contain our data.

S3DeploymentBucket.Description: An S3 Bucket name where assets are deployed

S3DeploymentRootKey.Description: An S3 key relative to the S3DeploymentBucket that points to the root of the deployment directory.

Properties.Name: NONE_DS
Properties.Description: None Data Source for Pipeline functions
